name: arkweb-app-debug
description: Professional debugging tool for HarmonyOS ArkWeb applications with AI-powered automated testing, zero dependencies, and auto-detection
author: ArkWeb Debug Team

chrome_devtools.config_command: claude mcp add --transport stdio arkweb-app-devtools --scope user -- npx chrome-devtools-mcp@latest -y --browser-url=http://127.0.0.1:9222

software: HDC (HarmonyOS Device Connector) - auto-detected by ohos-app-build-debug skill from DevEco Studio
Node.js & npm (for Chrome DevTools MCP, optional)

ohos-app-build-debug.purpose: Provides HarmonyOS application build, install, and launch features
ohos-app-build-debug.benefit: Automatically detects DevEco Studio and configures all development tools (hdc, hvigorw, etc.)
ohos-app-build-debug.integration: Use ohos-app-build-debug for build/install/launch, then arkweb-app-debug for DevTools debugging

quick_start.setup_mcp: claude mcp add --transport stdio arkweb-devtools --scope user -- npx chrome-devtools-mcp@latest -y --browser-url=http://127.0.0.1:9222

v1.0: Zero dependencies - no third-party Python packages
Automatic bundle name extraction from AppScope/app.json5
Chrome DevTools MCP integration with 26 AI debugging tools
